name: fraidycat
description: Follow blogs, wikis, YouTube, Twitter, Reddit, Instagram and the like... from a distance.

scripts.electron: fsbin emptyDir build/electron && fsbin copy src/root/electron build/electron && cross-env parcel build src/js/electron/main.js src/index.html src/background.html --target=electron --public-url ./ -d build/electron && electron-builder -mwl
scripts.electron:windows: fsbin emptyDir build/electron && fsbin copy src/root/electron build/electron && cross-env parcel build src/js/electron/main.js src/index.html src/background.html --target=electron --public-url ./ -d build/electron && electron-builder -w
scripts.dat: fsbin emptyDir build/dat && fsbin copy src/root/dat build/dat && cross-env STORAGE=dat parcel build src/index.html --no-cache -d build/dat
scripts.webext: fsbin emptyDir build/webext && fsbin copy src/root/webext build/webext && cross-env STORAGE=webext parcel build src/manifest.json -d build/webext
